sailpoint.integration

Interface HttpClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheHttpClient, SailPointHttpClient

    public interface HttpClient
    An HttpClient issues HTTP requests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS
      Option that can be passed into setup that will causes all certificates to be trusted when using SSL.
      static java.lang.String[] OPTS
      All of the options accepted by setup.

    • Field Detail

      • OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS

        static final java.lang.String OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS
        Option that can be passed into setup that will causes all certificates to be trusted when using SSL. This defaults to false if not set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPTS

        static final java.lang.String[] OPTS
        All of the options accepted by setup.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(boolean useSSL,
         int port,
         java.lang.String username,
         java.lang.String password,
         java.lang.String timeoutInSeconds,
         java.util.Map options)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Setup this client using the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        useSSL - Whether to use SSL or not.
        port - The port to use for the requests.
        username - The username for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        password - The password for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        timeoutInSeconds - The request timeout in seconds (optional).
        options - A map of options used to configure this client (optional).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

       java.lang.String postData)

        Perform an HTTP POST to the given URL using the given data in the post body.
